decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The facing materials to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension hereby approved shall be those specified in the approved drawing J197/06D or planning application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 2 - The timber and brick screens hereby approved shall be erected within 2 months of the date of this planning permission and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason for condition:  To protect the visual amenities of the occupiers of neighbouring properties.

Condition : 3 - The background noise level created from the air conditioning unit shall not exceed 2dB(a) L90 (5 min) when measured from the nearest affected property.

Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory standard of residential amenity for residential occupiers.
description: RETENTION OF AIR CONDITIONING PLANT AND DUCTWORK AND ERECTION OF BRICK AND TIMBER SCREENS TO REAR AND SIDE OF BUILDING AT FIRST FLOOR LEVEL.
